- Introduce R/Rstudio console and notebook format
- Learn how to import and inspect data in R

### Before Tuesday

- Download [R for mac](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/) by clicking on the first .pkg link on the webpage.
- Download [Rstudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
- Complete the [R Basics](https://posit.cloud/learn/recipes) recipes from posit.

### Before Thursday

- Complete the [Visualize Data](https://posit.cloud/learn/recipes) recipes from posit.
